definition: Hall of Supreme Harmony, the largest of the three halls that constitute the heart of the Outer Court of the Forbidden City 紫禁城[Zi3 jin4 cheng2]
highest/greatest/too (much)/very/extremely
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
surname He/Japanese (food, clothes etc)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
palace hall

sentences.english: The wind takes the form of the beast, the Imperial Palace of Beijing Taihe temple has this monster.
sentences.chinese: 嘲風形似獸，北京故宮的太和殿裏有這個怪獸。

sentences.english: Has renamed to the Qing Dynasty as too with the palace.
sentences.chinese: 到了清代改稱爲太和殿。

sentences.english: It is the smaller twin of the Hall of Supreme Harmony.
sentences.chinese: 它是太和殿小一號的孿生弟弟。

sentences.english: Baohe Dian is smaller than the Hall of Supreme Harmony.
sentences.chinese: 保和殿比太和殿規模小些。

sentences.english: And that is the Taihe Temple we see today.
sentences.chinese: 這就是今天我們看到的太和殿。
